transcript:
Customer: Ye
Executive: Good आफ्टरनून sir.
Customer: Sir jori baat kar rahe the India Mart se sir.
Executive: Sir aapne issue jo hai raise kiya tha aapne customer care number pe jo hai connect kiya tha to uske regarding hi mujhe aapse jo hai discussion karna tha sir.
Customer: Ha ha ha ha.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir aapko meri voice aa rahi hai?
Customer: Aawaz break ho raha hai aapka. Hello.
Executive: Voice break ho raha tha. Okay. Sir jaise ki aapne yahan pe bola tha ki aapko jo hai leads ka issue ho raha hai sir theek hai. To aapke product line mein jo leads hai bahut hi limited leads hai sir jo main aapko jo hai yahan pe show
Executive: kara sakti hoon. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur secondly aap bol rahe the na ki physical jo hai visit ke liye aapko jo hai koi online demo jo hai provide kare. To sir wo to possible hi nahi hai aapko jo online demo dena hai mere hand se as an account manager jitna possible hoga aapke liye best se best karana wo main aapka jo hai karwa sakti hoon sir.
Customer: Okay theek chalega na.
Executive: Like aapko kahan pe issue jo hai raise ho rahe hain uske regarding aapko services mein kahin problem aati hai leads ke regarding koi issue aa raha hai to main aapko jo hai apne hand se jo hai provide kara sakti hoon servicing sir best se best.
Customer: Kya aap abhi system par available hai sir?
Customer: Nahi na main abhi system pe available nahi hoon.
Executive: Kyunki sir mujhe jo hai discussion karna tha leads ke regarding agar jaise main leads ke bare mein bhi baat kar rahi hoon theek hai to hamare product line mein overall agar hum year se bhi baat karte hain to overall year mein hamare pass jo leads ka consumption hai wo bahut hi limited hai 5000 6000 ke around jo hai leads ka jo hai limitation hai sir theek hai jisme hamare jo products hain articulated boom lift hai boom lift rental hai JLG boom lift hai to isme abhi tak jo hai November mahine ke jo hai 15 15th of November tak hamare pass 200 100 aise hi leads jo hai available hui hai but sir aapki taraf se jo hai consume nahi ho pai kyunki shayad aap active India Mart ke page pe jo hai active nahi the.
Customer: Madam main wahi bol raha hoon aapko aapka jo mere ko bhi pata nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Okay. Ji ji aapko pata nahi chal raha hai.
Customer: Aur dusri baat to ye hai ji ki mere ko jo number change karna hai primary secondary wo number change karna hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ji. Wo kaise karenge aap ground level pe aapka banda koi service aapko dene ke liye nahi aayega to kaise ho jayega wahi mere ko samajh mein aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir wo main aapko online jo hai aapka aapko guide karungi uske basis pe aap apna jo registered mobile number hai wo change kar sakte hain sir.
Customer: Aur leads ka jo issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Jaunga na aapko call karunga.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: 15 minute me call karunga.
Executive: Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with leads.

- Wants to change primary and secondary number.

- Not aware of the leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the limited leads in product line.

- Executive offered online guidance to change number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile update, subscription
